title: BTBP (Better than Bombay potatoes)
ingredients: ['500g potatoes, diced', '4 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '15g fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon mild tandoori powder']
